thread.title: Cilic saves match point before defeating Chinese wild card
thread.title_full: Cilic saves match point before defeating Chinese wild card

title: Cilic saves match point before defeating Chinese wild card
text:
Cilic saves match point before defeating Chinese wild card   
SHANGHAI (AP) â€” Former U.S. Open champion Marin Cilic fought off a match point before rallying to defeat local hope Wu Di of China 4-6, 6-3, 7-6 (4) in the opening round of the Shanghai Masters on Monday. 
The 14th-seeded Cilic only allowed Wu two games in their previous encounter four years ago, but was tested by the 24-year-old Chinese player in front of hometown crowd in Shanghai. kAm%96 }@] aaf\C2?<65 (F D2G65 `` @7 E96 `c 3C62< A@:?ED 96 72465 2?5 3C@<6 E96 3:8\D6CG:?8 rC@2E:2?
